title: [Large-scale] Integrated Civic Literacy Program for Second Language Learners

context.prior_knowledge: Basic civic education concepts, intermediate-level second language proficiency
context.additional_context: Social domain education conducted in smartphone-based limited-technology environments

learning_goals: Learners can analyze civic education texts and explain core concepts about social structures and institutions with over 80% accuracy.
Learners can present integrated language-content proposals for civic participation through theme-centered discussion tasks.
Learners can interpret complex civic education materials according to a four-stage model framework (literacy, academic literacy, prior knowledge, content knowledge).

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
